name: After Hours
description: Groundbreaking research is encrypted on a computer from the 80's. Look through the computer and search the internet to crack the encryption in this fully Kickstarter backed augmented reality puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 839 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 839 MB available space
